metadata.subject: France. Cour des aides (Clermont-Ferrand)
metadata.title: Déclaration du roi, pourtant interdiction de la Cour des aides de Clermont-Ferrand, donnée à Versailles le 19 février 1782
metadata.creator: France.Sovereign (1774-1792 : Louis XVI)
France. Sovereign (1774-1792 : Louis XVI)
France. Cour des aides (Clermont-Ferrand)
metadata.call_number: Case Wing folio Z144 .A1 v. 9 no. 80
metadata.description: Suppression of Très humbles et très respecteuses itératives remontrances que présentent au roi, notre très honoré et souverain seigneur, les gens tenant sa Cour des aides de Clermont-Ferrand for errors of fact, contravention of rules governing the secret deliberations of government, and violation of the rules of the book trade. Without imprint
metadata.notes: No copyright found. No table of contents found. Damaged, stained pages and cover. Title on cover.
